title: Cant change back to legacy client.
body: When i go to change my client back to the legacy one, it doesn't open... tried this several times and still doesn't work.

replies.body: If you have a league of legends shortcut on your desktop home then right click it, open the file location, then search for lol.launcher.admin. It should have the old league logo by the file name. Double click it and run as admin and you'll open the old league client. The Link to change back to legacy from the new login screen wasnt working for me either.
You bro are a legend, hats off to you.
It's not letting me change a build on it it just goes back to the same one and when I go to the new client now it shows news for it pls help
Thanks dude!

thanks it really worked 

thank u so much

might be late to the party but id still like to say thanks. got my item sets back, things look like they should.. and hopefully the game doesnt crash after champ selection EVERY GAME. (and i guess i can see when people have honored me :D )

Oh wow, it was that simple... 
Thanks anyway.
I LOVE YOU
it only gives me a bugsplat... :( someone help meee.
THANKS BRO U SAVED MY LIFE
Thanks it worked for me too!
I should add that after you do this once the link to switch back to legacy client should start working for you and there's no need to go through the file location anymore.
You rock dude
thanks so much, it worked for me!!! Youʻre a legend.
I LOVE YOUUUUUUUUUUU <3 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

What exactly isn't opening?  What are the steps you're taking to launch the legacy client?  Are you accessing the legacy client through the new client, or manually through your league of legends folder?  Let me know!

In the new client login screen there is a small link that says something like "Switch back to legacy client", I guess people thought it would reopen league in legacy client but it just closes league completely.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F3vc4HsK,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-23T17:38:01.722+0000)
>
> What exactly isn't opening?  What are the steps you're taking to launch the legacy client?  Are you accessing the legacy client through the new client, or manually through your league of legends folder?  Let me know!

When I click open legacy client it opens and then it updates to the new client. Huge bug, don't know how to fix it.

I have tried launching from the new client through the link, and as an admin through the file path. I've corrected the opt-in cfg file to read as "no." I've done everything I can find, and am still able to open up the legacy client to the launch button. But as soon as I launch, the entire client closes out.

I was having the same issue as OP. I wanted to switch to legacy to play the featured game mode but the "legacy client" link in the new client doesn't open the legacy client it just closes the window and that's all. Someone's earlier suggestion of manually entering the folder and going to the legacy launcher from there works. Don't know why it never worked for me in the alpha client though.
I can confirm this, wont let me open it as well, and this new client is too laggy and ill miss picking my champ and it will ban me{{champion:83}}
Very true, I haven't been able to play a game since I switched to the new client. Champion select is the hardest, can't ban champions because of the lag and then I end up with a 5 minute timer :'(
same dude, it sucks
Also it keeps trying to update the game saying its a required update then stays at 55.3 mb out of 55.6 mb then it will close and let me into the newer league but not the legacy one
LOVE YOU BRO....IT WORKET...
HELP ME! I cant find lol.launcher.admin. When i try to click on the button that takes me to legacy client, lol just closes and never reopens{{champion:32}}
thanks bro .
My league client sometimes locks up and goes to like a grey scale and i cant play..

I did this, but when i press play on the old client it brings me to the new clients log in screen. I have tried finding the new clients file location and deleting it, but when i would go to open the old client it would tell me that the files were corrupted. At this point nothing is working, and i just straight up cant play the old client. Can someone please help???
Gotten cuck more times with the new client than i ever had playing Leagued
Thanks doud <3{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
my friend cant play draft and when he opens the legacy client it says he needs to update and the admin file wont work
